environment

类 Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.Environment
  • 直接已知子类:
    Maze 

    public abstract class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    The super-class of any environment.
    Project: Reinforce learning.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/MFAdaBoosting.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.
    Date Created: August 16, 2020.
    Last modified: August 16, 2020.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) ActionSpace actionSpace
      Action space.
      (专用程序包) int currentReward
      The current reward with the action just taken.
      (专用程序包) int currentState
      The current of the environment.
      (专用程序包) int numStates
      Number of states.
      static java.util.Random random
      Random generator.
      (专用程序包) int[][] rewardMatrix
      The reward matrix.
      (专用程序包) int[][] transitionMatrix
      The transition matrix.
      (专用程序包) int[][] validActions
      The valid actions for each state.

    • 字段详细资料

      • random

        public static java.util.Random random
        Random generator.

      • numStates

        int numStates
        Number of states.

      • actionSpace

        										ActionSpace actionSpace
        Action space.

      • rewardMatrix

        int[][] rewardMatrix
        The reward matrix. The number of rows is numStates, and the number of columns is numActions.

      • transitionMatrix

        int[][] transitionMatrix
        The transition matrix. The number of rows is numStates, and the number of columns is numActions.

      • currentState

        int currentState
        The current of the environment.

      • currentReward

        int currentReward
        The current reward with the action just taken.

      • validActions

        int[][] validActions
        The valid actions for each state. It is determined by the size of the environment.

        The number of states.

      • getValidActions

        public int[] getValidActions(int paraState)
        Get valid actions of the given state.
        参数:

        返回:

      • getActionSpace

        public ActionSpace getActionSpace()
        Getter.
        返回:
        The action space.

      • selectAction

        public abstract int selectAction()
        Select an action to take.
        返回:
        The action.

      • step

        public abstract void step(int paraAction)
        Go one step with the given action. The new state and the reward should be retrieved using other methods.
        参数:
        paraAction - The given action.
        另请参阅:
        getCurrentState(), getCurrentReward()
